New Helpdesk Request

Frequently Requested:

  • New User Account Request

To submit a new helpdesk request please login to our user portal , or send a detailed email to helpdesk@pa.ucla.edu .

You can now visit https://helpdesk.pa.ucla.edu at any time to monitor the status of your ticket(s) and/or reply to the team.
